testcase.name: Search GET /v1/videos?title=video18 - Verify only 1 video with title 'video18' exists and has its genre as Education

testcase.name: Search GET /v1/videos?genres=Sports - Verify exactly 2 videos are available for Sports genre
testcase.classname: GET /v1/videos?genres=Sports - Verify exactly 2 videos are available for Sports genre

testcase.name: Search GET /v1/videos?genres=Sports,Lifestyle - Verify exactly 4 videos are available for Sports/Lifestyle genres
testcase.classname: GET /v1/videos?genres=Sports,Lifestyle - Verify exactly 4 videos are available for Sports/Lifestyle genres

testcase.name: Search GET /v1/videos?contentRating=18%2B - Verify videos are returned with contentRating set as 18+
testcase.classname: GET /v1/videos?contentRating=18%2B - Verify videos are returned with contentRating set as 18+
